thread.section_title: Super 8 San Bruno /SF Intl Arpt West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Basic
thread.title_full: Basic - Review of Super 8 San Bruno /SF Intl Arpt West, San Bruno, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Joan K
title: Basic
text:
This was a very plain, basic motel with breakfast and shuttle service to the airport.
It was clean and comfortable but not attractive.
The breakfast area had very little seating. We did appreciate having hard cooked eggs and yogurt and not just cereal and sweet rolls.
We would probably stay here again for the convenience of being near the airport.
